forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of Saturday embrace Downtown San Francisco, a blanket of clouds softly cloaks the skyline, lending an air of mystery to the city. The temperature hovers around a cool 49 degrees, prompting the wise to wrap themselves in layers, perhaps a well-worn sweater accompanied by a light jacket, shielding against the gentle north wind. The clouds will begin to part as the day unfolds, yielding to moments of partial sunshine that struggle to warm the city, with an expected high nearing 62 and temperatures gradually retreating as afternoon approaches.

While fog may linger over the bay, hinting at the marine layer, the city itself remains relatively clear, allowing for glimpses of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, silhouetted against the fading dusk. For those yearning to make the most of the day, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the city's charming cafés might be the perfect way to savor the scenery while discussing the little things in life. Perhaps take time to explore the winding streets of Soma or relish the tranquility of a quiet park bench, sipping a warm drink in the midst of this picturesque urban haven.
